item.title: Editing Dataview Entries - ObsidianMD
item.description: Editing Dataview Entries - ObsidianMD There is one solution out there that uses Dataview.js (the JavaScript version of Dataview) with Obsidian Buttons to mimic this behavior: Using metaedit, buttons, templater, nldtase and dataview together - Share & showcase - Obsidian Forum.

item.title: [[2022-06-20]] Post About Diversity in Effective Altruism
item.description: [[2022-06-20]] Post About Diversity in Effective Altruism On the topic of diversity: YEA is one of the most diverse EA groups out there, and one of the biggest shockers for me when I first engaged with the broader EA community was the stark contrast and lack of diversity.

item.title: [[2021-07-08]] Post for Project YAM
item.description: [[2021-07-08]] Post for Project YAM Yalies! Ever wanted to meet other Yalies, but feel a bit too low-commitment to do so?
